Reviews.Title: “Excellent Customer Service”
Reviews.Author: katkev2003
Reviews.Content: The people at the front desk were amazing. They were sooo nice! The room was clean, and plenty roomy. Room enough for the 4 of us to spread out. I did ask for more shampoo because we used all of ours and never received it so follow thru could be better. Location was great. We never stayed that far away from the boardwalk before and didn't think we would like it but was wrong. surrounded by stores and eatery's. loved it!! Could use a pool.

Reviews.Title: “Stolen Property”
Reviews.Author: Noel H
Reviews.Content: My wife and I recently stayed at the Best Western. Upon Arrival another guest stole my IPAD while I was checking in. I immediately told the front desk staff and the response was "What do you want us to do"?. There was a camera system there and initially they refused to view the film. I called police and again requested we view the film. We were able to determine that there was one couple who must have taken the IPAD due to the fact that they were the only ones in the lobby at the time of the incident. Management refused to even ask them if they had seen my IPAD and did nothing. I am sure if it was them who were robbed they would have viewed the video in a timely fashion and attempted to locate my stolen property. This all happened in plain view while I was checking in. If you stay there remember that WHEN your stuff is stolen management will do NOTHING to help you retrieve. This is an actual quote from the ownwer "I would not want to do anything to make the suspected thiefs of you IPAD uncomfortable during their stay". Wow I bet she would see it differently if it were her IPAD missing.

Reviews.Title: “Suites are a great deal.”
Reviews.Author: KatyTravels
Reviews.Content: Stayed here the first weekend in August, 2012 with 9 other girls. Rooms were spacious enough for us and all our luggage. Perfect location close to the beach and Seacrets in a short walk. Free breakfast was a bonus. The price for a suite with 2 beds and a pullout couch fitting 6 people was the same as for a tiny regular hotel room - super worth it. Be prepared for noise though, lots of partiers. Staff was friendly and helpful!

Reviews.Title: “Great Place to stay”
Reviews.Author: alexandriava290000
Reviews.Content: The staff was great here and the hotel was very clean, quiet, the room was large and the beds are very comfortable. I would stay here again and it's a good value for your money.

Reviews.Title: “another great stay”
Reviews.Author: islandlover92
Reviews.Content: My wife and I stay here at least two or three times a year. the price is right, The rooms are always clean, the staff is friendly and the managers bend over backwards to meet your needs. Your very close to good restaurants shops and about a block and half to the beach.And most important your only a few blocks, walking distance to Seacrets bar and grill! They have a complimentry breakfast set up for you every morning toast,bagles,cereal, waffles and coffee,juice,pasteries everything you need to start your day. we have stayed at several places in OC we keep going back here, We will be going back again in three weeks

Reviews.Title: “Modest. Great location.”
Reviews.Author: Gigi219
Reviews.Content: It's not the fanciest place but it is in a great location. It does get a little loud because you're right on coastal hwy. it was a good price. The room is big. Lots of space.

Reviews.Title: “Okay-Not that clean.”
Reviews.Author: Acolz28
Reviews.Content: The service was okay, staff seemed overwhelmed but friendly. The cleanliness is what bothered me. Scuff marks all over walls. My comforter had stains. When I walked into the bathroom there was pee in my toilet. The grout was supposed to be white, but it was brown. Internet was slow. Location great, but since it is on the highway expect noise. Expect housekeeping issues.

Reviews.Title: “Great after cruise stay”
Reviews.Author: southguy
Reviews.Content: After returning to Baltimore, we drove to Ocean City, MD for two nights. Great welcome. We were given a Two Room Suite with two queen beds and sofa bed in the other room. TV and dressers in each room. Table, chairs and wet bar. The bathroom was large. The suite was clean, quiet and comfortable. Large bathroom with jetted tub. The breakfast was A1. Nice complimentary breakfast. The attendant will make the waffles for you. Hello and thank you to very friendly Joyce. They have an exercise room. Very close to the beach. One street to cross. Near all attractions and Boardwalk within a 5 minute drive. Good little grocery ''Minit Market'' at 3107 Coastal Hwy (south of the Hotel at 31st St. Full grocery products, cold cuts, cheese and homemade donuts. The Hotel is about an hour drive to the Lewes-Cape May Ferry driving North on same road. All the people, at reception, breakfast room, maids, were very nice and friendly, and yes indeed, Alexis is an excellent photographer. :) Great experience in a very affordable and safe place.

Reviews.Title: “Spacious suites, great staff, good prices”
Reviews.Author: Emilia K
Reviews.Content: A group of us just stayed for St. Patrick's weekend to watch the parade, which passed right by the hotel. Staff was very accommodating and friendly. Very nice breakfast spread. Suites are well equipped and spacious. Walking distance to all the hot spots, especially Seacrets. I noticed a few hairs on the dresser and swipe marks on the TV hutch that were a bit of a turn-off, but overall a great stay. We will be staying there, again!

Reviews.Title: “Great Stay at The Best Western OCMD!!!”
Reviews.Author: Shawn L
Reviews.Content: We spent a week at the Best Western and loved every minute of it. OCMD was a blast. This Hotel was only a block away from the Beach but is pretty far away from the boardwalk but its really not that big of a deal. I think it is in prime location as I mentioned before its across the street from the beach so you only have to walk down the block to get there. It is within walking distance (about 2 blocks) away from SEACRETS with is a definite plus as we spent a lot of time there. I highly recommend going. The rooms were pretty decent size and they were clean. The Front desk staff were friendly and very helpful. There is FREE Continental Breakfast every morning Down stairs in the Lobby area which is a plus. We are planning to go back to OCMD again and to be honest with you I wouldn't want to stay anywhere else!!

Reviews.Title: “Great Staff!!! Close to Secrets!”
Reviews.Author: susan d
Reviews.Content: Front desk girl was extremely nice, even upgraded us for free! Breakfast girl was great too. Everyone I came in contact with was so nice. Prices can be a little high in the summer but not bad at all in October. Also very close to Secrets.

Reviews.Title: “Large rooms, good prices”
Reviews.Author: loveabargain
Reviews.Content: The room was large with a king bed and a sofa and small table. A refrigerator and mircrowave were in a small foyer area with the closet. The bathroom was good with water jets in the tub and a large sink counter. The breakfast was adequate with coffee, juice, bagels, bread, cereal, eggs, and waffle maker. Free, but very slow wifi was part of the room. The furniture was old but was comfortable. Nothing was outstanding but all was okay. Thr price was lower than many places near this hotel. It is on the main road in OC and rooms near the stree are a bit noisy.

Reviews.Title: “Decent but if you need to stay in touch forget the WifI”
Reviews.Author: kramer
Reviews.Content: Just returned from a two day stay. The rooms are OK. Clean & modern. Night Front Desk Attendant was very helpful. There is no View and noise from the Highway in front of the Hotel. Breakfast was just OK little selection. The biggest problem & the reason I would never stay here again is that they use a Limited Bandwidth ISP Valuepoint that constantly has the Login SCreen popping up when you try to open a web page. Had to go to the Restaurant down the street just to answer e-mail. If you use a Computer to stay in touch avoid this property @ all cost you will need to leave the property and find a place with free Internet. I travel often and when I find a property using these substandard ISP, I make a note and never return to that Property. The Owners may be saving pennies by using these Jokes of a Service, but in the long run it will cost them Room Nights.!!!!! I kow I will never bee back. I am going to OC next Month I will be sure to avoid this property.

Reviews.Title: “Would definitely stay again”
Reviews.Author: Jenna846
Reviews.Content: My boyfriend and I stayed here for a few nights recently. It is in a great location, right next to Seacrets and Macky's. It's a block from the beach, but was pretty simple to cross the highway to get to the beach entrance. The room was big, with a king bed and a seperate sofa and table which was nice to watch TV. The bathroom was an average hotel bathroom, there was a jetted tub but we didn't use it. The beds were a bit firm for my liking.The continental breakfast was nice, especially with the waffles, but my only suggestion would be to extend it past 10am as we are late sleepers especially on vacation. The employees were very friendly. Good place for the price!

Reviews.Title: “Nice location, clean hotel, would return”
Reviews.Author: travelman1979_10
Reviews.Content: Stayed here about a year ago with a group of friends. Convient location across the street from the beach, but far enough away from all of the action going on down towards the boardwalk. We had a suite which was large enough for 4 of us. The breakfast was a nice touch too. Would return.

Reviews.Title: “Great stay at Best Western”
Reviews.Author: Nancy S
Reviews.Content: From check-in to the complimentary breakfast (now with Belgian waffles!!), our stay was delightful. We stayed in a King Suite on the 4th floor. There is no balcony or view to speak of, however the room was huge and very clean. We did have a squeaky bathroom door, which was rectified within minutes of our reporting it. The staff is very friendly. Our room was very quiet and the bed was comfortable. I highly recommend this property.

Reviews.Title: “Reasonably priced accommodations.”
Reviews.Author: RCRDSR
Reviews.Content: We stayed here while I attended a conference and my wife beached it every day. The room was great, clean and very comfortable. The common areas of the hotel could have been cleaner but our room was spotless. For a hotel with many families, it was very quiet. We would stay here again, especially since other hotels in the area we almost $500.00 a night during the busy season.

Reviews.Title: “Unclean and Rude staff”
Reviews.Author: Whitney C
Reviews.Content: When the reservation where made over the phone directly with BW, we were told our 2 rooms booked were across the hall from each other (a request we made). On checkin we asked before getting things out of car and going to rooms and we were told yes they were. They were not. They were down the hall from each other. When I mentioned to front desk "gentleman," he told me it's not possible to have the 2 type of rooms we booked across the hall from each other (because there were only standards across the hall from our suites). Then why were we told twice they were? And one of those times was not 10 minutes beforehand! And I saw in the other rooms when housekeeping where in the rooms and this was a lie. Then on our second morning there, we were rudely woken up by housekeeping staff loudly speaking in the hallway about personal issues and gossiping. When I told them children were asleep and to please keep it down, one of the "ladies" laughed at me. I asked how my request was funny and she said I didn't know what they were talking about. I told them I didn't care, I was there to SLEEP not to hear their conversation. They continued to speak loudly and YELL down the hall at each other throughout the morning. Later when we were packing everything up, I found a hat and beer bottle cap from previous 'tenants.' It was clear the rooms weren't being cleaned as our rooms after our first night stay was not vacuumed, items weren't restocked and the beds were barely made. I made my concerns known on checkout and was told that we could have 20% off our next stay. Why in the world would I return to a place where the room is going to be unclean and the staff is going to rudely wake us up??

Reviews.Title: “Would not refund my deposit for an emergency”
Reviews.Author: steacher11
Reviews.Content: I had a reservation for this hotel and and a dire family emergency arose which prevented me from leaving town. I spoke with Bob, who refused to even refund a portion of my deposit or work with me in any way. I realize that the cancellation was after the date required, but this was an emergency situation. I was very disappointed in their rudeness while being completely unsympathetic to my situation. I will never book with Best Western again.

Reviews.Title: “Great place to stay in a shore town.”
Reviews.Author: FOXY0099
Reviews.Content: If you've vacationed in any east coast beach town, you know most of the hotels are relatively the same with a few bad apples mixed in. This place was well in line with your shore hotel. We had the suite with microwave and fridge and it was very roomy. Free breakfast was a great perk with fresh waffles, cereal, fruit, and pastries. Two minor downsides... you can only have one parking spot, no exceptions. I even offered to pay for an additional spot. No way. There's free parking across the street, but spaces are limited. If you get one, DO NOT move your car. As it's right next to the beach, getting one during the day is next to impossible. Nighttime is easier. Second downer is there is no pool, but we actually snuck into the one attached to the condos near the back of the hotel without issue. Good place to stay, reasonably priced for the area.

Reviews.Title: “Beware of false charges made to your credit card”
Reviews.Author: SteveS21
Reviews.Content: I stayed at Best Western and it was a bad experience from the beginning. I made the reservation on the phone for 3 people and when I got there they had me down with a reservation for 1 person and told me they going to charge me $10 extra per person per night. When we got to the room there were no towels in the bathroom. I went back down stairs and I told the man at the front desk that we had no towels. He just rolled his eyes and went to a back room, then came back with the towels with no apology of any kind. Room service was slow if you got any. Other than that the rooms were ok. After my stay, luckily I checked my recent activity on my credit card. Not only did they charge me for the extra guests that I already made the reservation for but I found a random charge for $59. I called Best Westerns costumer's service and they looked into it for me. I received a voice mail from the manager at Best Western in OC that they "accidentally" charged me the $59 and that they would refund it. However, after talking in circles with Best Westerns cooperate customer service and the manager at the Best Western in Ocean City I gave up and I was never refunded the charges for the extra people I had already made the reservations for. When I priced out the hotels, I picked Best Western by a hair because it was slightly cheaper than another hotel I normally stay at with a pool. After giving them a shot, it ended up costing me more and I had to spend my work hours on the phone with customer service. Needless to say I will not be staying at a Best Western ever again.

Reviews.Title: “Clean in OC”
Reviews.Author: islandlover92
Reviews.Content: My wife and I like going to Ocean City MD,a few times a year during the summer. The last couple of years we have been staying at the Best Western OC,the prices are better or at least comparable to other hotels in the area the rooms are always clean,the staff is friendly,your close to restaurants and the best bars in OC,Seacrets and Fagers Island! We are going back to OC in August and we will be staying at the Best Western again!

Reviews.Title: “okay hotel”
Reviews.Author: traveltime110701
Reviews.Content: This is a classic example of you get what you pay for. It was not a horrible experience nor was it a great experience. It wasn't immaculate but definitely looked worn out. The employees were very helpful and friendly. The continental breakfast was okay..typical..

Reviews.Title: “Very Clean and convenient.”
Reviews.Author: B_O_G_27
Reviews.Content: Stayed at this hotel for three nights and it was perfect. We had a room with two double beds and a living area and area with microwave, and fridge. The bathroom was extremely clean as well. The location was very convenient to the beach, just a short block, and is convenient to other attractions as well. Just wished there was a pool.

Reviews.Title: “had fun”
Reviews.Author: teresa3000
Reviews.Content: The hotel is only a block away from the beach, but on the other side of the street. It is easy to cross it. The bus stops very very close to the hotel. Breakfast is good. The only complain I have is that the receptionists told us that she was going to call my husband ( who was at the beach) for early check in, she never did.

Reviews.Title: “Serves its purpose”
Reviews.Author: MattZup
Reviews.Content: I've stayed here twice in the past few years with a group of friends. We put together a 'guys' trip to OCMD every year and this is where we've been staying. The hotel is clean and the rooms fit 5 guys comfortably, with the pull out couch. It's a good place to hangout between trips to Seacrets. The staff is pleasant, especially the lady at the front desk (I forget her name). She remembered us from the previous year, which was a pleasant surprise.

Reviews.Title: “Great location and hotel forthe price!”
Reviews.Author: jmull1027
Reviews.Content: My husband and I were looking for a place in Ocean City that would allow us to have a little bit of space for both ourselves and our 1yr old son. We chose this place mainly due to the proximity to where the rest of our family was staying as well as the fact that it has suites available. The pictures online showed a bit of a separation between the bedroom and the kitchenette/living room area but when we got there we were pleasantly suprised that there was alot more space than the pictures showed. We had plenty of room and were able to even talk above a whisper int he living area after we put our son to bed. The only thing we were disappointed with was that there was no outside balcony in our room. The hotel staff was very friendly and helpful. There were amenities as far as breakfast and a workout area but we never took the opportunity to use them. The hotel was a great price for being able to get a suite and we were very satisfied with the experience. We plan to stay there again next year!

Reviews.Title: “WISH WE COULD HAVE STAYED LONGER...”
Reviews.Author: starrtreasures
Reviews.Content: CLEAN,CLEAN,CLEAN....We will stay again and again.Friendly staff,great location,great price...and just a great experience.

Reviews.Title: “Good only for a place to sleep”
Reviews.Author: StacyNice
Reviews.Content: Housekeeping did a great job and were very friendly as was the maintenance man however the front desk staff rarely cracked a smile or offered a greeting. We were there 8 days and were only acknowledged once by the front desk in our coming and going, in spite of the hotel's website priding themselves on their customer service. The hotel location is not the most convenient, requring a drive to most everywhere, especially the boardwalk and good luck with boardwalk parking! The entrance/exit is narrow, resulting in cars having to back up so one car can enter while another leaves. Once we ended up sitting in the bike lane of the highway because the narrow opening did not allow us to pull in while another car was trying to exit. Hallway and room was a little run down, there is only one small elevator for the hotel which often created a delay. My whole family laughed at the jacuzzi jets in the standard size bathtub, unless you are a child you could not sit in that small tub and enjoy the jacuzzi option - that was ridiculous. Not to mention that the bathroom is very small, you have to have the door shut to be able to move around in it. Plus there was no balcony - a major disapointment! Nice features? Continental breakfast was good, computer with printer was nice to have, and housekeeping was thorough (although by week's end the room really needed to be dusted).

Reviews.Title: “Very nice hotel”
Reviews.Content: Hotel was very nice i have a great stay. Staff was amazing. Amanda was very helpful

Reviews.Title: “Very Good Value”
Reviews.Author: Stat-Boy-8
Reviews.Content: Stayed during "SpringFest" weekend. Easy Check-In/Check-Out. Very friendly staff. The Std 2Q room was big. Clean, although the carpeting is beginning to show some age. Standard Cont. Breakfast is fine. Joyce, the hostess, is a lot of fun, and very knowledgeable abt. the area. Walk to Macky's, Fager's Island, Hall's, Atrium Cafe in the QI across Coastal Highway. About 6 blcks to JR's. There is a new (still in final stages of construction) small shopping Center on the corner of 56th St. that contains a Pizza Shop, Beer/Wine Market, and a Dunkin Donuts. Hotel Staff were expecting them to be open for business by Memorial Day Weekend. Less than a block to the $2 ride-all-day Bus Stop. Hotel is in a great location, and offers a great value. Reminder to all that there is No Pool on this property. This property an excellent value. My stay was off-season, so I can't speak to what it is like during the Summer. I'd certainly go back there again!

Reviews.Title: “Very helpful staff, nice breakfast, and in-room jacuzzi tub”
Reviews.Author: calico66
Reviews.Content: This was my first trip to Ocean City, and though most of it was still closed for the season, I had a nice time regardless. The staff at the hotel are extremely nice, the rooms spacious and well appointed, and I loved the tub with the jets! Just out back is another rental property, and sitting in its parking garage watching the sun set over the bay was one of the most peaceful experiences I've had. I suppose it's entirely different in high season, but that's the beauty of off-season. A huge room with breakfast for $50 can't be beat. The bike lane is right out front, and walking to the beach takes about 3 minutes as the island is so narrow. The hotel is about 30-odd blocks from the north end of boardwalk, but with my bike I had no issues. The staff also said I could keep my bike in my room if I wished. (I just left it locked on my car rack) The elevator is nice and big so it would not be a problem. The fitness center was decent enough to work up a sweat before breakfast. The only issues I had were minor- no "Do Not Disturb" hangtag for my door, and the pen and notepad were hidden in a drawer so I had to scramble to find something when taking a phone message. The housekeeping staff replaced the hangtag as soon as they saw my handwritten note in the door. There is a computer and printer for guest use in the breakfast room so checking email was easy. There is covered parking, which is nice if the weather doesn't cooperate. I would definitely stay again, kudos to the the incredible staff here.

Reviews.Title: “Great Service!”
Reviews.Author: cpo-chick
Reviews.Content: The service at this Best Western was outstanding. We were on a long weekend trip with a one stay in Ocean City. We arrived very early at 10:30 a.m. and the front desk let us check in even though check time is not normally until 3:00 p.m.! The room was very spacious and clean - the jacuzzi type bath tub was a nice plus too as well as the breakfast. Will definitely stay here again if going through Ocean City. I would recommend to any one.

Reviews.Title: “Still a Winner”
Reviews.Author: sungodes
Reviews.Content: This is the second time that have I stayed here, the first time in September of 2007. The customer service was great then and has remained so. I was with a large tour group and once again they were ready and waiting. We were greeted by a light refreshment reception while our luggage was transported to our rooms and we got our keys. The room was a standard but spacious with a plenty of seating for relaxing or eating. Once again the room and all other areas were spotless and staff helpful. The first time I stayed here in 2007 I was with the same tour group. This hotel had everything ready and our check-in was completed before we exited the bus and our luggage taken to our rooms. The same process was done upon check-out. Great large clean rooms/suites, accommodating and pleasant staff. The free continental breakfast is a plus for those who may be on a budget. Additionally in room fridges and coffee maker make this a winner for a moderate priced stay in Ocean City, Maryland. The only con is that this gem is not oceanfront, but, definitely worth the money and lack of a waters view.

Reviews.Title: “Not the lap of luxury, but a pretty decent hotel - I would recommend it”
Reviews.Author: deadonred
Reviews.Content: This is kind of a no frills experience, but I wasn't looking for frills at this price. We had a Deluxe Double - two queens, effectively two rooms and a bath. We were pleased. The place is clean, the staff is friendly, breakfast was adequate and the location is just fine if you're not interested in staying within walking distance of the boardwalk. I would recommend it to anyone who wants to save a few bucks by staying a block from the beach instead of on the beach and who doesn't want to be near the board walk. Don't try to check in before three. We got there at 2:30 and had to kill about 45 minutes. You will not be wowed by this hotel (the picture on this site is pretty much the whole picture). You will feel comfortable, safe, clean, frugal, etc. If that's what you're looking for, go for it. They have a computer for guests to use (not what I'd call a business center) and free wifi which we took advantage of when we wanted local info. No restaurant, no pool, free parking.

Reviews.Title: “Very nice staf!”
Reviews.Author: SwedenBjorn
Reviews.Content: This was the first stop we made when we arrived from Sweden for our trip along Americas east coast. We made a lot of hotel nights after this but it was one of the place with the most welcoming people. Nice clean rooms. Helpful personal. I was traveling with my old mother from and we were very pleased with the service we got and was really surprised over the nice breakfast. If we pass Ocean City, Maryland again sometime, we will definitely stay at this hotel again.

Reviews.Title: “great location for night life”
Reviews.Author: tmminva10
Reviews.Content: Hotel was just average, but location is excellent for nightlife at Fagers Island and Seacrets which are both within walking distance. Room was clean, but had a strong smell of cleaning chemicals. Beach is a short walk across the street. Not the nicest hotel, but not the worst either. Would stay again for a short visit if planning to go to bars/nightclubs.

Reviews.Title: “don't be fooled”
Reviews.Author: unclesamspad2
Reviews.Content: the description of this hotel on the best western website states that it is a "BRAND NEW " Hotel. this leads you to beleive that it is a crisp and clean hotel. not the case! this is an older hotel that is run down, there are numerous stains in the corridors, the linens were yellowed, and the walls were dirty looking. the worst part was that the matress was so bad you could see a large sag in the center, and the bed felt like it would colapse when you moved. this is absolutely the worst best western I have ever stayed at. On the plus side, the staff was very freindly

Reviews.Title: “Disappointing”
Reviews.Author: travelingfun2008
Reviews.Content: We stayed there last month. Must say it was quite overpriced for the room. Pretty run down for a "newer" hotel and things were not as clean as they should have been. I would stay away from this place if you have a family with young kids. For as much as they charge, one can do a lot better. We were disappointed, particularly since the rate was up in the 200s per night.

Reviews.Title: “Not bad for the price”
Reviews.Author: kcrom
Reviews.Content: We got this hotel for $125/night which is unheard of in Ocean City during the month of July. Usually cannot find one for under $200. The hotel was nice from the outside, but could use some sprucing up on the inside. They seemed to have a decent breakfast spread, although we chose to eat elsewhere because we weren't sure how clean it was. I found garbage under the bed in our room when we checked in, so that shattered my confidence in the cleaning staff. Cleaning staff also wasn't friendly at all. JoAnn at the front desk was wonderful and made up for the rest of them. Not sure I would stay at this hotel again though. To me, cleanliness is everything.

Reviews.Title: “Big and clean”
Reviews.Author: RahulAgrawal
Reviews.Content: This was a a very clean hotel. Rooms were big so it easily fit in 6 people. 4 on beds and 2 on sofa bed. Had a nice clean kitchen too. It is quite far from the boardwalk but the bus is just downstairs on the street. It took like 20-30 mins on the bus to the main boardwalk area. parking is an issue too. They allow only one car per room and say that they will tow the second car but it didn;t happen in our case.

Reviews.Title: “Great hotel in Ocean City, MD”
Reviews.Author: sba51
Reviews.Content: Great price. Hotel was clean, room very large, queen size extra long bed, jacuzzi tub and GREAT continental breakfast in a lovely setting. The reception desk people went above and beyond when asked questions about the area, so far as to print maps, make great recommendations and try to assist in every way. Nice location, just one walkable block to beach. Would not hesitate to stay here again when visiting Ocean City, MD.

Reviews.Title: “Basically Very Good”
Reviews.Author: joandmarty
Reviews.Content: This was my second stay at this, somewhat basic, hotel this year. I was more than satisfied last time and again more than satisfied this time. On the third and last night a very large group of male golfers checked in with all of their usual equipment, BREWSKY, and surprise, they seemed to peter out by about ten o'clock. But it was pretty raucous for a while and they were on my floor. But, the fitness room was good and the coffee was good and best of all the bed was comfortable and the shower worked. I would go back to this hotel, and you should try it if all you want is a good comfortable stay for the money.

HotelInfo.Name: BEST WESTERN Ocean City Hotel & Suites
HotelInfo.Address: 5501 Coastal Highway, Ocean City, MD 21842-1344
